name: OMG! BIRDS!
description:
OMG! BIRDS! GO GET 'EM!! An ARKit game in which you are a dog. WHAT? 

YOUR DOG IS YOUR PARTNER IN LIFE AND IN THIS GAME!  Play co-op with your dog for extra bird support! Get your dog in the game with toys, treats or anything else you can find within reason. Or not within reason...YOU ARE A DOG!!

Built with ARKit in Unity3d.
